title: Nutrition Planner
description: As a restaurant chef you used to put together a menu which provides a healthy balance of nutrition to best serve your guests, now you can leverage on those skills to come up with the weekly menu for example ina hospital.

title: Recipie book writer
description: As restaurant chef you used to come up with your unique chef specialities, now it`s time to collect all those  recepie and publish them in an online  or printed version.

title: Online cooking show mediator
description: As a restaurant manager you had the best cooking manoeuvres  and skills how to please your guests with delicious dinner, now you can teahc some of your secret cookign skills to the public.

title: Food delivery manager
description: Food delivery requires ample coordination between food producers and consumers. As a Chef, you likely have very good skills for coordinating complicated efforts and you can probably excel as a food delivery manager.
